member.name: D3D12_DEBUG_DEVICE_GPU_SLOWDOWN_PERFORMANCE_FACTOR
member.summary: Describes the amount of artificial slowdown inserted by the debug device to simulate lower-performance graphics adapters.

member.name: D3D12_DEBUG_DEVICE_GPU_SLOWDOWN_PERFORMANCE_FACTOR.SlowdownFactor
member.summary: Specifies the amount of slowdown artificially applied, as a factor of the nominal time for the fence to signal. The default value is 0.
